solution_line_template: The total time of the programs is {num_programs} programs * {minutes_per_program} minutes/program = <<{num_programs}*{minutes_per_program}={total_program_time}>>{total_program_time} minutes

A quarter of this time is spent on commercials, so that's {total_program_time} minutes / {commercial_divisor} = <<{total_program_time}/{commercial_divisor}={commercial_time}>>{commercial_time} minutes
